directions: Place sauerkraut in a colander and squeeze out all excess liquid using your hands; chop well.
Combine sauerkraut, onion, apple, and carrots in a large bowl and mix. Add oil and sugar and toss to combine. Season with caraway seeds, salt, and pepper. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon caraway seeds, or more to taste  (Optional)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Polish Sauerkraut and Carrot Salad
